name: places/ChIJnVtEO-5EwokRoydyVUYhNuw
formattedAddress: 252 W 76th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 252 W 76th St, New York, NY 10023-8226, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of working with Manhattan Shades, and I can confidently say that my experience was nothing short of outstanding. From start to finish, they exceeded my expectations in every way possible.

First and foremost, I was impressed with the fair prices they offered. Finding high-quality shades at reasonable prices can be a challenge, but Manhattan Shades struck the perfect balance. I felt like I got an incredible value for my investment.

The quality of the shades they provided is top-notch. The materials feel durable and look elegant, adding a touch of sophistication to my space. I am beyond satisfied with the product I received.

Another aspect that stood out to me was the speed at which they handled the installation. The team at Manhattan Shades is incredibly efficient, and the installation process was completed without any hiccups. I didn't have to wait long to enjoy my new shades.

What truly sets Manhattan Shades apart is their exceptional customer service, especially from Jacob. Whenever I had a question or needed assistance, Jacob was there with a lightning-fast response. His knowledge and professionalism are second to none. I felt like a valued customer throughout the entire process.

I must mention that Jacob's attention to detail and willingness to go the extra mile made a significant difference. He ensured that all my specific requirements were met, and he offered valuable suggestions to enhance the overall experience.

Thanks to Manhattan Shades and Jacob, my living space has been transformed, and I couldn't be happier with the results. I wholeheartedly recommend Manhattan Shades to anyone in need of shades or window treatments. They are the epitome of excellence in the industry.

In conclusion, my journey with Manhattan Shades was exceptional, thanks to their fair prices, high-quality products, speedy installations, and, most importantly, Jacob's outstanding customer service. You won't be disappointed with their services – they truly deliver on their promises!

Thank you, Manhattan Shades, and thank you, Jacob, for a wonderful experience!

originalText.text: I couldn't be happier with my new motorized shades.  Jacob made the process so easy.  The work was done quickly,  professionally, and fastidiously--a "white glove job."  And at a much better price then many competitors.  I wish I had found them sooner!

originalText.text: Jacob and Manhattan Shades are communicative, reliable , they also do great work, I’ve used them several times. Highly recommend AAA+++

text.text: Jacob and Manhattan Shades are communicative, reliable , they also do great work, I’ve used them several times. Highly recommend AAA+++

originalText.text: Things were great until a few days later when we noticed one of the shades they had installed had marks all over it. Someone came from Manhattan Shades to look at them and told us they'd send someone to steam out the marks. When I followed up with Jacob to set up the appointment, he refused and told me his guy found nothing wrong and I could return the shade for 35% of my money back.
